title: Harmful Disruption of Service - ATT02042022
description:
If you try to make a call through AT&T with a phone not compatible with their new system, they force your phone call to people like this poor Suzette lady.

Good thing she didn't really need me to dox my phone number tho.

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/2bZtrzTYza
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/
